{{also|bein|be-in|bein'}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|bein}}, from {{inh|de|goh|bein}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*bainą}}. Compare {{cog|nl|been}}, {{cog|en|bone}}, {{cog|da|ben}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/baɪ̯n/}} * {{audio|de|De-Bein.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aɪ̯n}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Beins|gen2=Beines|Beine|Beinchen}} # [[leg]] of a person, animal, or object; {{non-gloss definition|generally including the feet, but sometimes, in a more specific sense, excluding them}} # {{lb|de|archaic}} [[bone]] ====Usage notes==== * The sense of ''bone'' is widely obsolete in standard usage, apart from a limited number of still common compounds, such as {{m|de|Schlüsselbein}} and {{m|de|Steißbein}}. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|(e)s|e}} ====Derived terms==== {{sense|leg}} * {{l|de|auf den Beinen}} * {{l|de|auf einem Bein kann man nicht stehen}} * {{l|de|Beine bis zum Boden}} * {{l|de|Bankbein}} * {{l|de|Hinterbein}} * {{l|de|Holzbein}} * {{l|de|Stuhlbein}} * {{l|de|Tischbein}} * {{l|de|Vorderbein}} {{sense|bone}} * {{l|de|Beinhaus|g=n}} * {{l|de|Brustbein}} * {{l|de|Dickbein}} * {{l|de|Elfenbein|g=n}} * {{l|de|Gebein|g=n}} * {{l|de|Nasenbein|g=n}} * {{l|de|Scheitelbein}} * {{l|de|Schienbein}} * {{l|de|Schläfenbein}} * {{l|de|Schlüsselbein|g=n}} * {{l|de|Steißbein|g=n}} * {{l|de|Wadenbein}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Anatomy]] ---- ==German Low German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{qualifier|in other dialects, including Low Prussian}} {{l|nds-de|Been}} ===Etymology=== See '''[[Been]]'''. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nds-de|/bɛɪ̯n/|/baɪ̯n/}} ===Noun=== {{nds-de-noun|m|Beiner|pl2=Beinen}} # {{lb|nds-de|in some dialects}} [[leg]] ===Noun=== {{nds-de-noun|n}} # {{lb|nds-de|in some dialects}} [[bone]] (as material) # {{lb|nds-de|in some dialects}} [[bone]]s; a skeleton or [[skeleton]]s ===See also=== * {{l|nds-de|Knaken}}, {{l|nds-de|Knake}}; {{l|nds-de|Knoake}} * Plautdietsch: {{m|pdt|Been}}
